display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while in a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic
